Run sPLS algorithm

Source: R/spls.R
spls_run.Rd

Runs the sPLS algorithm (mixOmics::spls()) from the mixOmics package.

Usage

spls_run(spls_input, ...)

Arguments

spls_input

A mixOmics input object created with get_input_spls().

...

Arguments passed to mixOmics::spls().

Value

An object of class mixo.spls (if keepX and/or keepY arguments were provided) or mix.pls (if they were not), see mixOmics::spls() and mixOmics::pls().
